github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Never ask the user to perform actions that you can do yourself
Project uses yarn, not npm. Do not use npm commands.
Before making changes verify from Codebase any assumptions that your plan makes.
When resolving type errors, do not use 'any'. Prefer inferred types, correct package types, or as a last resort, unknown.
eslint errors should be fixed in the code, not in the eslint config. Do not disable eslint rules. Find the correct solution to the problem.
Always ask for clarity if the instructions are not clear. Do not make assumptions.
You are in a VSCode dev container, if required development tools are missing Dockerfile can be modified directly.
When resolving test failures, building, or running commands, prefer yarn scripts in package.json
If validating a fix made for a lint or test failure, use the the appropriate limited command to run just the file(s) that are failing.
This project uses React, Next.js, TypeScript, and React Bootstrap for UI.
